name: Cheesy Salmon Pasta
author: VLuv
summary: For those who love salmon, here's a new way to switch it up a bit. Simple and easy, yet simply satisfying! You will want more and more. It's rich, has a nice tangy flavor to it, and is absolutely delicious!
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) cans salmon, drained and flaked
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Stir in the onions, green onions, and pesto
Mix in salmon, and cook until heated through
Stir in 1/2 the Parmesan cheese, and continue cooking 5 minutes
Toss with the cooked pasta, and sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese to serve
